page.title: 02Sports in Pitreavie
page.content: In Dunfermline there are many recreation grounds. At the eastern side there is a golf club and a sports stadium, Pitreavie Golf Course was built 63 years ago. It is a private golf club but visitors can come if they pay. Beside the golf course is the Pitreavie Sports Pavillion and Stadium. It has many pitches. It has a running track which is four hundred metres long. Many events go on there. Linsey McDonald trained at Pitreavie Sports Stadium. She was running in the relay team for Scotland in the 1980 Olympics. At the western side is McKane Park. It has various pitches, the main two being rugby and cricket. There are also squash courts. Pamela Amos and Nichola Ricketts.
